text: Carla Laureano is an American author of inspirational romance and young adult fantasy. In 2014, she received the Romance Writers of America RITA Award for Best Inspirational Romance for her debut novel Five Days in Skye. ==Biography== Laureano earned a degree in English in 1997 from Pepperdine University where she studied literature and criticism. She has worked as a salesperson, marketing manager, copywriter, and small business consultant. In addition, she wrote for publications produced by the World Health Organization. She lives in Denver, Colorado with her husband and two sons. ==Bibliography== ===As Carla Laureano=== *The MacDonald Family Trilogy :# :# ===As C.E. Laureano=== *The Song of Seare Trilogy :# :# ==Awards and reception== * 2014 - Romance Writers of America RITA Award for Best Inspirational Romance for Five Days in Skye *Beneath the Forsaken City, and Oath of the Brotherhood were RT Book Reviews Top Picks. ==References== == External links == * Author's Blog * Author's Website Category:Living people Category:American romantic fiction writers Category:RITA Award winners Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Pepperdine University alumni Category:21st-century American novelists Category:American women novelists Category:Women romantic fiction writers Category:21st-century American women writers
title: Carla Laureano
